input.sentences: [male] went to swim at the beach .
he was training to become a professional surf boarder .
he was so incredibly focused that day on just his training .
there was little time to relax on the beach [male] spent most of the day in the water .
training to become the best he could be .
output.sentences: A man went for a swim at the beach.
He saw a professional surf instructor training a client.
The client seemed incredibly focused and determined to complete the training.
The water was extremely cold and the man thought to himself, "Why would someone pay to be in the water for such a long time."
